org.assertj.swing.core

Class WindowAncestorFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.assertj.swing.core.WindowAncestorFinder

  • public final class WindowAncestorFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    Looks up an AWT or Swing Component's Window ancestor.
    Author:
    Yvonne Wang

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.awt.Window windowAncestorOf(java.awt.Component c)
      Similar to javax.swing.SwingUtilities#getWindowAncestor(Component), but returns the AWT or Swing Component itself if it is a Window, or the invoker's Window if on a pop-up.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • windowAncestorOf

        @RunsInCurrentThread
@Nullable
public static java.awt.Window windowAncestorOf(@Nonnull
                                                            java.awt.Component c)

        Similar to javax.swing.SwingUtilities#getWindowAncestor(Component), but returns the AWT or Swing Component itself if it is a Window, or the invoker's Window if on a pop-up.

        Note: This method is accessed in the current executing thread. Such thread may or may not be the event dispatch thread (EDT.) Client code must call this method from the EDT.

        Parameters:
        c - the Component to get the Window ancestor of.
        Returns:
        the Window ancestor of the given Component, the Component itself if it is a Window, or the invoker's Window if on a pop-up.
